page.title: 19TEBAY PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: School begins at 0900 and finishes at 1515 with breaks from 1045 to 1100, 1200 to 1300 and 1430 to 1440.The curriculum includes maths,language work,art, P.E,games, swimming(summer term)R.E,science, topic and project work. We use calculators and a BBC B micro. There's no uniform.At Tebay School we have our own school meals , cooked by electric. There are 3 dinner ladies.There are two full time teachers,&one part time teacher.We have 3 classrooms.on Thursdays and Fridays class two is empty because the part time teacher isn't there.There are three store rooms, separated toilets,mixed cloak rooms,big hall we use for dinner, P.E and assembly.The teachers are Mr Sharkey(Head),Mrs Sowerby, Mr Willett (part time ). { } {
